title: ozoqoproject
author: ozoqoproject
created_time: December 18, 2022, 04:28:38 PMLast edit: March 07, 2023, 01:58:15 PM by ozoqoproject
content: Introduction:Pozoqo is a new cryptocurrency designed to offer fast and secure transactions, while also empowering its users to earn rewards through the Masternode system. Built on the X5 algorithm, Pozoqo ensures a fair and decentralized mining process. The network is secured by a network of Masternodes that validate transactions and also perform other important functions like InstantSend and Coinjoin.The Purpose of Pozoqo:Pozoqo aims to provide a fast and secure way of sending and receiving transactions while enabling users to earn rewards through its Masternode system. The Masternode system ensures the stability and security of the blockchain network, which makes Pozoqo a popular choice among investors and traders. With fast transaction speeds and low transaction fees, Pozoqo intends to be a popular choice for daily transactions.Technical Specifications:Maximum Supply: 21 billion PZQAlgorithm: X5 and MasternodeTicker: PZQBlock Time: 60 secondsBlock Reward: 7000 PZQ (from block 0 to 499) and 3500 PZQ thereafterMasternode Requirement: 1,000 PZQ (At block less than 7999) and 1,000,000 from Height 8,000Mining:Pozoqo is a proof-of-work (PoW) cryptocurrency that utilizes the X5 algorithm, which ensures a fair and decentralized mining process. The block reward is 7000 PZQ from block 0 to 499 and 3500 PZQ thereafter. However, only Masternodes are eligible to receive the block rewards from block less than 7999 but from block height 8000, Miners would start to earn rewards.Masternodes:Pozoqo's Masternodes play a vital role in the network by performing essential functions such as InstantSend and Coinjoin. Masternodes are necessary for the stability and security of the blockchain network. To become a Masternode, users must own 1,000 PZQ, which serves as collateral to demonstrate their commitment to the network.InstantSend:InstantSend is a feature that enables Pozoqo users to make fast and secure transactions. InstantSend transactions are processed in seconds, making it an attractive option for daily transactions.CoinJoin:CoinJoin is a method of mixing multiple transactions together to obfuscate their origins and improve their privacy.CoinJoin is facilitated through a feature called "Masternode Quorums", which allows users to pool their transactions together in a trustless and decentralized manner. When a sufficient number of transactions have been pooled together, a special "Masternode Quorum" is formed and the transactions are mixed together to obscure their origins.This process helps to protect user privacy by making it more difficult for outside observers to track and identify individual transactions. While it does not provide complete anonymity, it can significantly improve the privacy and security of Dash transactions.Governance:Pozoqo's governance system is managed by its Masternode operators. Masternode operators vote on proposals that impact the network's development, and the proposals with the most votes are approved. This ensures that the network's growth and development align with the interests of its users.Roadmap:Pozoqo has a roadmap for its development and growth, which includes expanding its user base, listing on more exchanges, and enhancing its features. These features include enabling Atomic Swaps, a decentralized exchange, and enhancing the Masternode system.++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++Â ðŸ§š ðŸ§š Â ðŸ§š Â STAGE 1 Â  ðŸ§š ðŸ§š Â ðŸ§š Â âœ… Â Generating Genesis BlockÂ âœ… Â Making Wallets for Ubuntu, Windows and Mac OS (ðŸ•’)Â âœ… Â Block Explorer LaunchÂ âœ… Â Social MediaÂ âœ… Â Announcement on Bitcointalk++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ðŸ§š ðŸ§š Â ðŸ§š Â STAGE 2  Â ðŸ§š ðŸ§š Â ðŸ§š ðŸ•’ Â Listing on XeggeX Exchange ðŸ•’ Â Listing on XredX ExchangeðŸ•’ Â Listing on Bitoreum ExchangeðŸ•’ Listing on Cratex ExchangeðŸ•’ Â Listing on Exbitron ExchangeðŸ•’ Â Listing on Finexbox ExchangeðŸ•’ Â Listing on Vindax ExchangeðŸ•’ Â Listing on Octium ExchangeðŸ•’ Â Listing on Dex-Trade ExchangeðŸ•’ Â Discord Wallet Bot++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ðŸ§š ðŸ§š Â ðŸ§š Â STAGE 3  Â ðŸ§š ðŸ§š Â ðŸ§š ðŸ•’ Publishing the Web WalletðŸ•’ Â Listing on NomicsðŸ•’ Â Listing on BlockSpot.ioðŸ•’ Â Listing on MinerstatðŸ•’ Â Publishing Android Wallet -> ðŸ•’ Â Listed on Coinpaprika ðŸ•’ Â Listed on Coinmarketcap Listing -> ðŸ•’ Â Listed on CetoEX ExchangeðŸ•’ Â Listed on P2B2B ExchangeðŸ•’ Â Whitepaper Announcement (Second Realese)ðŸ•’ Â Listing on TradeOgre ++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++Conclusion:Pozoqo is a fast and secure cryptocurrency that offers a reliable and efficient way of sending and receiving transactions. The Masternode system helps to ensure the stability and security of the network while allowing users to earn rewards for their commitment to the network. With its fast transaction speeds and low transaction fees, Pozoqo aims to become a popular choice for daily transactions. Its governance system ensures that its growth and development align with the interests of its users.VARIOUS LINKS AREHardfork of our wallet would take place at height 8000, for miners to earn rewardswebsite: https://pozoqo.techSource: https://github.com/pozoqoproject/pozoqoExplorer: https://explorer.pozoqo.tech/Discord: https://discord.gg/8bxpTRKvbDDownload Wallet: https://github.com/pozoqoproject/pozoqo/releases/tag/v19.0.0Our Swap 1:1 is currently on going

comments.author: albon
comments.body: Where is the team behind this project? Where is the whitepaper? Where are the project goals? Even all the social media links lead to the link to join the discord server only, which contains one member, and the template of the site is primitive and not professional at all, in addition to that after I downloaded the wallet from the GitHub site, it turned out that it is not safe, so I do not advise anyone to download POZOQO wallet and run it on his computer, so as not to be hacked.@OP your project is suspicious, and I do not think that anyone will risk his funds and the safety of his devices for nothing.

comments.author: ozoqoproject
comments.body: Quote from: albon on December 18, 2022, 06:32:28 PMWhere is the team behind this project? Where is the whitepaper? Where are the project goals? Even all the social media links lead to the link to join the discord server only, which contains one member, and the template of the site is primitive and not professional at all, in addition to that after I downloaded the wallet from the GitHub site, it turned out that it is not safe, so I do not advise anyone to download POZOQO wallet and run it on his computer, so as not to be hacked.@OP your project is suspicious, and I do not think that anyone will risk his money and the safety of his devices for nothing.All your questions would be looked into. Whitepaper is on its way, the goals would be better communicated. As for social media, I would properly set them up. For website, i would make it better. You said its not safe? Kindly state what kind of virus you noticed, because its AN OPEN SOURCE, you can simply point us to the virus in the github source. Please kindly point to me the kind of virus you noticed.

comments.author: selfwithin
comments.body: This is huge scam... Peercoin project runs fine. No need to create fork without any innovation into original code. Peercoin was forked out of bitcoin since it was adding Proof of Stake concusses to blockchain.This Project has nothing innovative or white paper. This is easy pump and dump scam or adding virus to your PC....I would recommend stay away from the project.

comments.author: holydarkness
comments.body: Quote from: ozoqoproject on January 02, 2023, 01:50:49 AMQuote from: selfwithin on January 01, 2023, 02:42:09 AMThis is huge scam... Peercoin project runs fine. No need to create fork without any innovation into original code. Peercoin was forked out of bitcoin since it was adding Proof of Stake concusses to blockchain.This Project has nothing innovative or white paper. This is easy pump and dump scam or adding virus to your PC....I would recommend stay away from the project.from this : This is easy pump and dump scam or adding virus to your PC.... and this: This is easy pump and dump scam. shows you are frustrated.What is the current supply? that you claimed is a pump and dump scam? Also its an open source, where did you notice virus was added into it?As we speak the current supply at block 1879 is 93,950. Our new updates (from block height 1880) will get the blockchain to a fast confirmation with a block time of 1 minutesYour windows wallet does detected for virus by virustotal, I doublechecked the result given by pestxo by reuploading the file for a new scan, the result is as below:Â Amongst them, are these two, NetTool.Win32.TorTool.gen and Trojan.GenericKD.64525574. NetTool summarized asQuoteExecutable code extraction.Creates RWX memory. Unconventionial language used in binary resources: Nepali;Queries information on disks, possibly for anti-virtualization. Network activity detected but not expressed in API logs. Anomalous binary characteristics. Ciphering the records found on the victimâ€™s disk drive â€” so the sufferer can no longer utilize the information;Preventing regular access to the suffererâ€™s workstation.while genericKD summarized asQuoteTrojan.GenericKD.2427119 appears to be a ZIP file containing a PDF document, but when extracted, the contained file is an executable program that silently connects to remote servers to download files onto the infected machine. During the analysis, one of the downloaded files attempted to use the machine to send spam email messages.I am giving you a benefit of doubt that those malware were unintentional, but to protect the best interest of anyone stumbled upon your thread and the project --and through it, the infected wallet-- I'd have to leave a negative tag. Please fix them. Once you have and uploaded a better version of your wallet, kindly notify me and I'll be happy to remove the tag once it is proven to be clean.Meanwhile, remove the wallet immediately so anyone can't download it. I'll be forced to escalate the situation to a scam accusation and raise a flag if you refused to do so.
